extensionDescription.message: Quickly move messages into other folders using the keyboard

windowWarning.message: It is recommended to add Quick Folder Move to the main toolbar. Please customize your toolbar to enable the button.

metaActionWarning.message: Switching between actions now requires using Ctrl/⌘+Arrow to avoid navigation conflicts in the text box.

tagsViewMissingWarning.message: Please enable the 'Tags' folder view to go to tag folders.

markAsRead.message: Mark messages as read when moving

showFolderPath.message: Show full path of each folder in search box

maxRecentFolders.message: Number of recent folders to show

maxRecentFoldersTitle.message: Changes the number of recent folders shown when no search text is entered.

useLegacyShortcutsTitle.message: Use ⇧M as the shortcut for moving messages

defaultFoldersSearchPlaceholder.message: Search for a folder to add as default

excludedFoldersSearchPlaceholder.message: Search for a folder to exclude

partialMatchFullPath.message: Search for keywords within the entire folder path
